prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:01,540",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "私は走りました。"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:01,540",
    "end": "00:00:05,360",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "このポテトは懐かしいポテトを描いています。"
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Những củ khoai tây này gợi lại kỷ niệm về khoai tây.
